item.title: This Whole Thing Stinks!
item.description: First of all, don’t ask I have no idea where this idea came from, it just happened. I keep saying “I’m not especially proud of this” but in reality? I sort of am because it’s funny as shit (pun intended). Some projects came across my twitter feed that included (I shit you not) a 3-D printable model of the ðŸ’© emoji. I remember nothing else about that project, but you’d better believe that I went straight for that STL file!
